title: I Before E,  Except TDZ 4/29: Lauren Boebert & Marjorie Taylor Greene, Boris Becker, NFL Drat, NBA Playoffs, Van Jones & Bugs Bunny
itunes:title: I Before E,  Except TDZ 4/29: Lauren Boebert & Marjorie Taylor Greene, Boris Becker, NFL Drat, NBA Playoffs, Van Jones & Bugs Bunny
description:
In this edition of Trends, Jack and Miles discuss Lauren Boebert & Marjorie Taylor Greene getting into an altercation at a GOP meeting, tennis star Boris Becker being sentenced to 2 1/2 years in prison for committing fraud after declaring bankruptcy, the NFL Draft, a preview of the second round of the NBA Playoffs and tonight's Game 6 of the Timberwolves/Grizzlies series, Van Jones' comments regarding the black community's disappointment at the lack of follow through on campaign promises and Bug Bunny trending after a rant by Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis about how in his childhood, he could watch cartoons without having to worry about liberal ideology being forced upon him.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
